reviewText: I give it five stars for shipping and quality. The DVD is broke down into easy sections, and David is a great teacher. I jumped right into the solo part of the DVD when it arrived :)  and in about less than a week i was playing the solo and a couple days later i had the whole song down pat! Good job Next Level Guitar!!!
This guitar lesson is broken down well. my dog could be a guitar god from watching this guy teach.
